name: 李有豐
objective:
本課程主要教授學生七大項方向1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題7.程式分析實習

===============
The course contents are divided into 7 major topics: 1. Review the matrix theory; 2.Basic concepts of the matrix structural theory; 3. Stiffness method; 4. Using stiffness method to solve truss problem; 5. Using stiffness method to solve beam problem; 6. Using stiffness method to solve rigid frame problem; 7. Practice of the structural analysis program.

This course is based on Matrix Analysis, Mechanics of Materials, and Theory of Structures.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Matrix Structural Analysis
Week 2: CH1 Matrix, Determinants and System of Linear Equations
Week 3: CH2 Basic Concept
Week 4: CH3 Stiffness Method
Week 5: CH3 Stiffness Method
Week 6: CH4 Analysis of Truss using Stiffness Method
Week 7: CH4 Analysis of Truss using Stiffness Method (continue), CH4 Examples
Week 8: CH4 Examples (continue)
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: CH5 Analysis of Beams Using the Stiffness Method
Week 11: CH5 Analysis of Beams Using the Stiffness Method (continue), CH5 Example
Week 12: CH5 Example (continue)
Week 13: CH6 Analysis of Rigid Frames Using the Stiffness Method
Week 14: CH6 Analysis of Rigid Frames Using the Stiffness Method (continue)
Week 15: CH6 Example
Week 16: CH6 Example (continue)
Week 17: CH7 Others
Week 18: Final Exam
